text: John-Roger Hinkins (born Roger Delano Hinkins) (September 24, 1934 â€“ October 22, 2014) was an American author and public speaker. He was the founder of the Movement of Spiritual Inner Awareness (MSIA), as well as several other New Age, spiritual, and self-help organizations. Hinkins died in Los Angeles, California, aged 80.Founder of controversial spiritualist group MSIA whose followers include Arianna Huffington dies at age 80 ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Writers from Utah
title: John-Roger Hinkins
